group.text:
When previewing the Tracker Desktop please keep the following in mind:
  • This is a milestone3 release of the Tracker Desktop.
  • The Tracker Desktop milestone3 releases are consider pre-beta milestone releases. (Beta testing will begin with the milestone4 releases.)
  • The milestone3 releases of Tracker Desktop are intended for demonstration to prospective beta testing candidates and project sponsors only.

The Tracker Desktop is Provisioning Enabled Eclipse Rich Client Platform Product:
  • The Tracker Desktop supports the new Eclipse P2 Provisioning service.
  • When it is first installed, the Tracker Desktop contains no Tracker features.
  • All Tracker features will have to be provisioned by the user from network based component repositories.

link.text: Provision Tracker Desktop with features or update it from the Verticon.com and Eclipse.org repositories
